resources.string:
Happyworx Speech Recognition Demo


This demo was programmed as a Proof of Concept for Pocketsphinx in context of a reading app for children.


In this demo, Pocketsphinx is used in combination with the VoxForge language model for the Dutch language. To learn more about Pocketsphinx, visit 

 http://cmusphinx.sourceforge.net/ 

 To learn more about VoxForge, visit 

 www.voxforge.org.


If you want to know more about the HappyWorx initiative, please go to our FaceBook page or visit www.happyworx.nl.
